Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson and Riley Greene each hit a two-run homer
Brant Hurter pitched five innings of one-run ball for the win
Jason Foley got his 20th save with a perfect ninth
Rich Hill issued a leadoff walk to Kerry Carpenter in the bottom half
Jace Jung struck out before Torkelson hit a drive to left for his eighth homer
Greene lined a two-run homer in the sixth, his 20th of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Torkelson and Greene's homers helped the Tigers earn a rare series win against the Red Sox
The Tigers won the season series for the first time since 2017
Hurter expressed embracing any role offered to him
Greene reached 20 homers for the first time in his career
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brant Hurter got his first major league win
Rich Hill issued a leadoff walk to Kerry Carpenter
Conner Wong played in left field for the Red Sox
The game was part of a series honoring the 1984 championship team
